sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import '../Style/Home.scss'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default () => { const navRef = useRef(), aboutRef = useRef(), workRef = useRef(), contactRef = useRef(); const [ backgroundColor, setBackgroundColor ] = useState('#f7f3f0'); const [ navPosition, setNavPosition ] = useState(false); const [ navActive, setNavActive ] = useState({ about: '', work: '', contact: '' }) const [ aboutAni, setAboutAni ] = useState(''); // const [ contactAni, setContactAni ] = useState(''); let offsetTop = { current: 0, nav: 0, about: 0, work: 0, contact: 0 } useEffect(() => { handleNavPosition(); setTimeout(() => { setAboutAni('--active'); }, 310); console.log('useEffect for mount') }, []) useEffect(() => { offsetTop = { nav: navRef.current.offsetTop, about: aboutRef.current.offsetTop, work: workRef.current.offsetTop, contact: contactRef.current.offsetTop } window.addEventListener('scroll', () => { offsetTop.current = window.pageYOffset; handleNavPosition(); handleNavEffect(); console.log('scroll event working') }); console.log('useEffect'); }, []); const handleNavPosition = () => { if(offsetTop.current > window.innerHeight) { setNavPosition(false); }else{ setNavPosition(-offsetTop.current * .75); } } const handleNavEffect = () => { if(offsetTop.current > offsetTop.contact * 0.8){ setNavActive({ about: '', work: '', contact: '--active' }) }else if(offsetTop.current > offsetTop.work * 0.8){ setNavActive({ about: '', work: '--active', contact: '' }) }else if(offsetTop.current > offsetTop.about){ setNavActive({ about: '--active', work: '', contact: '' }) } } return (

Developer

JIA
SONG

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet. consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed vitae tortor ultricies, consequat dolor quis, pretium mauris. Pellentesque habitant morbi. tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Maecenas porttitor mi in lectus vehicula, non viverra sapien pharetra.

What I learn

JavaScript, React
CSS3, SASS, Styled-Component, Responsive-Design
HTML5, Adobe Photoshop

What I want to learn

Node.js, TypeScript
